ruling: - See [[Gladiator Beast Alexander]] for additional rulings.

- If [[Gladiator Beast Hoplomus]] is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, its original DEF becomes 2400. If [[Skill Drain]] is later activated, this effect is negated and [[Gladiator Beast Hoplomus]]' original DEF will return to 2100. Even if [[Skill Drain]] is later negated or removed from the field, the original DEF of [[Gladiator Beast Hoplomus]] will remain at 2100.

- If [[Gladiator Beast Hoplomus]] is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster and it is flipped face-down, when it is flipped face-up its effect will not be reapplied so its original DEF will be 2100.
